wikipedia_page.main: Christina Jamieson (1864–1942) was a British writer and suffragist known for her association with the Shetland Isles.

response: Christina Jamieson who was a local writer and suffragist was born here in 1864.Brian Smith, ‘Jamieson, Christina (1864–1942)’, Oxford Dictionary of National Biography, Oxford University Press, 2004 accessed 24 Nov 2017
